header.type: HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS, SUBMISSIONS QUESTIONS AND ANSWERS

testimony: Mrs Mayidume you have the evidence that have been put before us.   I want to know if you are confirming this evidence.  If you are, is there something you would like to add?

Thank you Mr Chairperson.
  There is nothing I would like to add because my requests are documented.   I just pray that the Lord may fulfil my needs. 
 I also request that something may be done to commemorate Nonqulana so that the future generations may see where the battle started and men died for our land.
 Thank you Sir.
